Module AppointmentScheduleAPP

Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppointmentController
    The Appointment controller class builds and populates the Appointment> tableview.
    CustomerController
    This controller class builds and populates the Customer tableview.
    LoginScreenController
    This class validates access to the software program.
    MainScreenController
    This class is the user's entry point after logging into the program.
    NewAppointmentController
    This class creates new appointments and saves them to the database.
    NewCustomerController
    This class creates new customer and saves them to the database.
    ReportAppointmentByContactController
    This class shows a tableview of all appointments that contain the contact id that is equal to the user's selection.
    ReportAppointmentByTypeController
    This class creates a table to shows the shows the total count of appointments grouped by customer and type for the month that is selected.
    ReportsController
    This class shows the list of reports available for the user to select from.
    ReportsTotalCustomerController
    This class shows a total number of customers in the database.
    UpdateAppointmentController
    This class updates appointments and saves them to the database.
    UpdateCustomerController
    This class update a customer and saves it to the database.
